TopicTitle: Possible to un-link symmetricly build hinges in KAL-1000?

Articles.Content: I have a frustrating problem. I added Hinges in symmetry mode and want to controll them independent but they only move together. I can add both in the pitch action group or in the KAL-1000 but they always change to the same rotation, settings etc. How do i unlink them or do i really have to add them seperatly without symmetry mode?
You can just turn off symmetry for the part
I think you need to turn on advanced tweakables in the menu and then turn off symmetry
